Text:
Hi Teddikilla,

Are there only 42 episodes of this Anime. On Wikipedia its showing 33 Volumes and 329 episodes. 

Do you have the other episodes as well. If you have them then please upload.

Thanks in Advance.

Thanks for this!! =)

@konoha_uchica: No, there are only 42 episodes of this anime. The manga, however, consist of 329 chapters in 33 volumes. It is all there on the wikipedia page. By the way, the anime does not cover the entire manga and has a rather open end. It's still great though =)
Haven't watched that far, but Audio, Video & Subtitle seem fine though. Thanks!

Just finished watching the whole episodes. There were few lines missing. About ten of them, I think. 

E.g. When Recca told his dad not to smoke while working on the fireworks, in episode 1.

Not a major letdown if you could live with it--about 3 to 4 episodes only affected.
